#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
};
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i,c=0,j;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n],b[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
           a[i]=inp();b[i]=inp();// scanf("%d%d",&a[i],&b[i]);
            for(j=0;j<i;j++)
            {
                if(a[j]>a[i]&&b[j]<=b[i])c++;
                else if(a[j]<a[i]&&b[j]>=b[i])c++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
